description: Inquisitive's performance is a slippery slope, particularly difficult to reach stability due to Sinytra Connector (among other mod's) alpha nature. But we sure hecka try, particularly through these mods and areas addressed:
- Achievement Optimization (there are a bunch)
- Attribute Fix (compensation for modded data)
- Bad Optimizations (Fixing unneccessary updates)
- Bocchium (void bedrock culling)
- Debugify (fixing many mojang bug trackers)
- Dynamic FPS (lowers fps when tabbed out of game)
- Embeddium (Powerhouse rework of tons of rendering optimizations, among many others)
- Entity Culling (Partly covered with Embeddium, solidifies culling w/ connector)
- Fast Suite, Workbench & Furnace (rework how recipes & crafting are cached)
- FastAnim (animation calculation fixes)
- FerriteCore (patches memory leaks)
- ImmediatelyFast (optimizes immediate mode rendering)
- Memory Leak Fix (patches other memory leaks)
- Mobtimizations (Mob task/pathfinding fixes)
- ModernFix (General Optimizations)
- Noisium (Noise-based generation system optimizations)
-  Out Of Sight (Mod-inclusive entity & blockentity culling)
- Packet Fixer (patches diverse packet sends on connections)
- Particle Core (Particle culling & optimizations)
- Radium (General optimization & well-esteemed port of Lithum for forge)
- Redirector (Optimizes Enum access speed)
- ServerCore (TPS optimizations, mob optimizations and more serverend customizability)
- Smooth Boot (increases loading time and optimizes memory usage on load)
- XXL Packets (supports larger packet sizes on connection load)
- spark (at the end of the modlist for some reason? performance profiler, run /spark profiler start, or /sparkc for client instead of server)
